metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7811 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
Memory safety bugs were reported in Firefox 55. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort thatsome of these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 56.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7811` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 56.0+build6-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '56.0+build6-0ubuntu1').
